title: Video Podcast #106 BikeRumor Editors Choice Awards
content:
Hey BikeRumor Fans! 

For the last (recorded) podcast of 2024, the BikeRumor team sits down and talks about their top picks for Editors Choice. Things get spicy as each Editor describes how and why they chose each piece of kit.  — Enjoy! 

*Like all the Monthly Round-up podcast Episodes, the BikeRumor Editors Choice 2024 podcast has a companion video available on the BikeRumor Youtube Channel or below.

Joining Jordan for this episode are, Zach Overholt, Cory Benson, Ron Frazelle, and Riley Marshall

Checkout Every BikeRumor 2024 Editor’s Choice: 

  • Zach Overholt Editors Choice 
  • Cory Benson Editors Choice 
  • Jordan Villella Editors Choice 
  • Ron Frazelle Editors Choice 
  • Steve Fisher Editors Choice

Why a Round-Up?

Sometimes, we have more to say about a review or news piece. Each author gives a deep dive into their product review and a behind-the-scenes look at BR Team. Don’t worry — it’s not all weights and “what they should have done”; there’s a fair share of goofing off. 

Just Want The Audio? Check out the BikeRumor podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or the link below.

Want More?

Find every episode of the BikeRumor Podcast on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Podbean. Or through RSS, or wherever you listen to podcasts! Hit like, hit subscribe, and hit play! Can’t find it? Let us know which players you use so we can get them up to speed! Let us know who you want us to interview,  use this form to send us your suggestions!

Follow Bikerumor

Keep tabs on all the latest bikes, wheels, components, gear, and tech on The World’s Largest Cycling Tech Blog by following us on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Follow Jordan and Tyler
